name: Rule of Thumb
description:
** THIS GAME WAS CREATED FOR PROUD TO BE - GAME JAM 2019 ** Important
  • Intended to be played with an Xbox One-style game controller
  • Designed for two local players only
  • Not especially polished, as it was created for a game jam
Description

Are you a proudly left-handed loyalist or are you a vehemently right-handed ragamuffin?

Either way, the time has come for you to prove your hands' worth, as you are introduced to a new kind "thumb war" in which you must fight for (the) control(ler) by firing rockets to destroy all the opposing hands' generators before they destroy yours.

So step up, grab a complementary-handed competitor and embrace the handedness with which you were born as you battle in a bid to prove who really has "the better hand".

Controls

ActionLeft PlayerRight Player Aim RocketLeft ThumbstickRight Thumbstick Prepare RocketLeft Trigger (Hold)Right Trigger (Hold) Fire RocketLeft Trigger (Release)Right Trigger (Release)
DON'T DELAY - YOUR PRIDE IS AT STAKE!
